00032 /*
00033 
00034 Candidates for testing the validity of the Healpix routines:
00035 
00036 - done: ang2pix(pix2ang(i)) = i for all Healpix_Bases
00037 - done: pix2ang(ang2pix(ptg)) dot ptg > 1-delta for all Healpix_Bases
00038 - done: ring2nest(nest2ring(i)) = i for all hierarchical Healpix_Bases
00039 - done: downgrade(upgrade(map)) = map for all maps
00040 - done: map and downgraded map should have same average
00041 - done: alm2map(map2alm(map)) approx map (same for pol)
00042 - partly done: neighbor tests
00043 - powspec -> alm -> powspec (should produce similar powspecs, also for pol)
00044 - done: two swap_schemes() should produce original map
00045 - done: query_disc tests (dot products etc.)
00046 - a_lms: test Set(), Scale(), Add(), alm(l,m) = alm.mstart(m)[l], etc.
00047 
00048 */
00049

00065 const int nsamples = 1000000;
00066 
00067 planck_rng rng;

00069 namespace {
00070 
00071 void random_dir (pointing &ptg)
00072   {
00073   ptg.theta = acos(rng.rand_uni()*2-1);
00074   ptg.phi = rng.rand_uni()*twopi;
00075   }
00076 void random_zphi (double &z, double &phi)
00077   {
00078   z = rng.rand_uni()*2-1;
00079   phi = rng.rand_uni()*twopi;
00080   }
00081 
00082 template<typename I> string bname()
00083   { return string("(basetype: ")+type2typename<I>()+")"; }
00084 
00085 template<typename I> void check_ringnestring()
00086   {
00087   cout << "testing ring2nest(nest2ring(m))==m " << bname<I>() << endl;
00088   for (int order=0; order<=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max; ++order)
00089     {
00090     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,RING);
00091     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00092       {
00093       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base.Npix());
00094       if (base.ring2nest(base.nest2ring(pix))!=pix)
00095         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00096       }
00097     }
00098   }

00100 template<typename I> void check_nestpeanonest()
00101   {
00102   cout << "testing peano2nest(nest2peano(m))==m " << bname<I>() << endl;
00103   for (int order=0; order<=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max; ++order)
00104     {
00105     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,NEST);
00106     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00107       {
00108       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base.Npix());
00109       if (base.peano2nest(base.nest2peano(pix))!=pix)
00110         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00111       }
00112     }
00113   }

00115 template<typename I> void check_pixzphipix()
00116   {
00117   cout << "testing zphi2pix(pix2zphi(m))==m " << bname<I>() << endl;
00118   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00119   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00120     {
00121     T_Healpix_Base<I> base1 (order,RING), base2 (order,NEST);
00122     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00123       {
00124       double z,phi;
00125       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base1.Npix());
00126       base1.pix2zphi(pix,z,phi);
00127       if (base1.zphi2pix(z,phi)!=pix)
00128         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00129       base2.pix2zphi(pix,z,phi);
00130       if (base2.zphi2pix(z,phi)!=pix)
00131         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00132       }
00133     }
00134   for (I nside=3; nside<(I(1)<<omax); nside+=nside/2+1)
00135     {
00136     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (nside,RING,SET_NSIDE);
00137     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00138       {
00139       double z,phi;
00140       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base.Npix());
00141       base.pix2zphi(pix,z,phi);
00142       if (base.zphi2pix(z,phi)!=pix)
00143         cout << "  PROBLEM: nside = " << nside << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00144       }
00145     }
00146   }

00148 template<typename I> void check_zphipixzphi()
00149   {
00150   cout << "testing pix2zphi(zphi2pix(ptg)) approx zphi " << bname<I>() << endl;
00151   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00152   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00153     {
00154     T_Healpix_Base<I> base1 (order,NEST), base2 (order,RING);
00155     double mincos = min (cos(base1.max_pixrad()),0.999999999999999);
00156     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00157       {
00158       double z,phi,z2,phi2;
00159       random_zphi (z,phi);
00160       base1.pix2zphi(base1.zphi2pix(z,phi),z2,phi2);
00161       if (cosdist_zphi(z,phi,z2,phi2)<mincos)
00162         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order
00163              << ", zphi = " << z << ", " << phi << endl;
00164       base2.pix2zphi(base2.zphi2pix(z,phi),z2,phi2);
00165       if (cosdist_zphi(z,phi,z2,phi2)<mincos)
00166         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order
00167              << ", zphi = " << z << ", " << phi << endl;
00168       }
00169     }
00170   for (int nside=3; nside<(I(1)<<omax); nside+=nside/2+1)
00171     {
00172     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (nside,RING,SET_NSIDE);
00173     double mincos = min (cos(base.max_pixrad()),0.999999999999999);
00174     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00175       {
00176       double z,phi,z2,phi2;
00177       random_zphi (z,phi);
00178       base.pix2zphi(base.zphi2pix(z,phi),z2,phi2);
00179       if (cosdist_zphi(z,phi,z2,phi2)<mincos)
00180         cout << "  PROBLEM: nside = " << nside
00181              << ", zphi = " << z << ", " << phi << endl;
00182       }
00183     }
00184   }

00186 template<typename I> void check_pixangpix()
00187   {
00188   cout << "testing ang2pix(pix2ang(m))==m " << bname<I>() << endl;
00189   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00190   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00191     {
00192     T_Healpix_Base<I> base1 (order,RING), base2 (order,NEST);
00193     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00194       {
00195       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base1.Npix());
00196       if (base1.ang2pix(base1.pix2ang(pix))!=pix)
00197         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00198       if (base2.ang2pix(base2.pix2ang(pix))!=pix)
00199         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00200       }
00201     }
00202   for (I nside=3; nside<(I(1)<<omax); nside+=nside/2+1)
00203     {
00204     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (nside,RING,SET_NSIDE);
00205     for (int m=0; m<nsamples; ++m)
00206       {
00207       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base.Npix());
00208       if (base.ang2pix(base.pix2ang(pix))!=pix)
00209         cout << "  PROBLEM: nside = " << nside << ", pixel = " << pix << endl;
00210       }
00211     }
00212   }
00213 
00214 template<typename I> void check_neighbors()
00215   {
00216   cout << "testing neighbor function " << bname<I>() << endl;
00217   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00218   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00219     {
00220     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,NEST), base2(order,RING);
00221     double maxang = 2.01*base.max_pixrad();
00222     for (int m=0; m<nsamples/10; ++m)
00223       {
00224       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base.Npix());
00225       fix_arr<I,8> nb,nb2;
00226       vec3 pixpt = base.pix2vec(pix);
00227       base.neighbors(pix,nb);
00228       base2.neighbors(base.nest2ring(pix),nb2);
00229       for (int n=0; n<8; ++n)
00230         if (nb[n]<0)
00231           planck_assert(nb2[n]<0,"neighbor inconsistency");
00232         else
00233           planck_assert(base.nest2ring(nb[n])==nb2[n],"neighbor inconsistency");
00234       sort(&nb[0],&nb[0]+8);
00235       int check=0;
00236       for (int n=0; n<8; ++n)
00237         {
00238         if (nb[n]<0)
00239           ++check;
00240         else
00241           {
00242           if (v_angle(base.pix2vec(nb[n]),pixpt)>maxang)
00243             cout << " PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pix = " << pix << endl;
00244           if ((n>0) && (nb[n]==nb[n-1]))
00245             cout << " PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pix = " << pix << endl;
00246           }
00247         }
00248       planck_assert((check<=1)||((order==0)&&(check<=2)),"too few neighbors");
00249       }
00250     }
00251   for (I nside=3; nside<(I(1)<<omax); nside+=nside/2+1)
00252     {
00253     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (nside,RING,SET_NSIDE);
00254     double maxang = 2.01*base.max_pixrad();
00255     for (int m=0; m<nsamples/10; ++m)
00256       {
00257       I pix = I(rng.rand_uni()*base.Npix());
00258       fix_arr<I,8> nb;
00259       vec3 pixpt = base.pix2vec(pix);
00260       base.neighbors(pix,nb);
00261       for (int n=0; n<8; ++n)
00262         if ((nb[n]>=0) && (v_angle(base.pix2vec(nb[n]),pixpt)>maxang))
00263           cout << "  PROBLEM: nside = " << nside << ", pix = " << pix << endl;
00264       }
00265     }
00266   }
00267 
00268 void check_swap_scheme()
00269   {
00270   cout << "testing whether double swap_scheme() returns the original map"
00271        << endl << "(for orders 0 to 10)." << endl;
00272   for (int order=0; order<=10; ++order)
00273     {
00274     Healpix_Map<uint8> map(order,NEST);
00275     for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m) map[m]=uint8(m&0xFF);
00276     map.swap_scheme();
00277     map.swap_scheme();
00278     for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00279       if (map[m]!=(m&0xFF))
00280         cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", pix = " << m << endl;
00281     }
00282   }
00283 
00284 void check_query_disc_strict (Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme)
00285   {
00286   cout << "testing whether all pixels found by query_disc() really" << endl
00287        << "lie inside the disk (and vice versa)" << endl;
00288   cout << "Ordering scheme: " << (scheme==RING ? "RING" : "NEST") << endl;
00289   for (int order=0; order<=5; ++order)
00290     {
00291     Healpix_Map<bool> map (order,scheme);
00292     map.fill(false);
00293     Healpix_Map<vec3> vmap(order,scheme);
00294     for (int m=0; m<vmap.Npix(); ++m)
00295       vmap[m]=vmap.pix2vec(m);
00296     rangeset<int> pixset;
00297     for (int m=0; m<100000; ++m)
00298       {
00299       pointing ptg;
00300       random_dir (ptg);
00301       double rad = pi/1 * rng.rand_uni();
00302       map.query_disc(ptg,rad,pixset);
00303       vec3 vptg=ptg;
00304       double cosrad=cos(rad);
00305       for (tsize j=0; j<pixset.size(); ++j)
00306         for (int i=pixset.ivbegin(j); i<pixset.ivend(j); ++i)
00307           map[i] = true;
00308       for (int i=0; i<map.Npix(); ++i)
00309         {
00310         bool inside = dotprod(vmap[i],vptg)>cosrad;
00311         if (inside^map[i])
00312           cout << "  PROBLEM: order = " << order << ", ptg = " << ptg << endl;
00313         }
00314       for (tsize j=0; j<pixset.size(); ++j)
00315         for (int i=pixset.ivbegin(j); i<pixset.ivend(j); ++i)
00316           map[i] = false;
00317       }
00318     }
00319   }
00320 
00321 template<typename I>void check_query_disc()
00322   {
00323   cout << "checking query_disc() " << bname<I>() << endl;
00324   int omax=min(20,T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max);
00325   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00326     {
00327     T_Healpix_Base<I> rbase (order,RING), nbase (order,NEST);
00328     rangeset<I> pixset;
00329     int niter=max(1,min(1000,100000>>order));
00330     for (int m=0; m<niter; ++m)
00331       {
00332       pointing ptg;
00333       random_dir (ptg);
00334       double rad = pi/1 * rng.rand_uni();
00335       rbase.query_disc(ptg,rad,pixset);
00336       rangeset<I> pslast=pixset;
00337       for (tsize fct=5; fct>0; --fct)
00338         {
00339         rangeset<I> psi;
00340         rbase.query_disc_inclusive(ptg,rad,psi,fct);
00341         if (!psi.contains(pslast))
00342           cout << "  PROBLEM: pixel sets inconsistent" << endl;
00343         swap(pslast,psi);
00344         }
00345       I nval = pixset.nval();
00346       nbase.query_disc(ptg,rad,pixset);
00347       pslast=pixset;
00348       for (tsize fct=8; fct>0; fct>>=1)
00349         {
00350         rangeset<I> psi;
00351         nbase.query_disc_inclusive(ptg,rad,psi,fct);
00352         if (!psi.contains(pslast))
00353           cout << "  PROBLEM: pixel sets inconsistent" << endl;
00354         swap(pslast,psi);
00355         }
00356       if (nval!=pixset.nval())
00357         cout << "  PROBLEM: number of pixels different: "
00358              << nval << " vs. " << pixset.nval() << endl;
00359       }
00360     }
00361   }
00362 template<typename I>void check_query_polygon()
00363   {
00364   cout << "checking query_polygon() " << bname<I>() << endl;
00365   int omax=min(20,T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max);
00366   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00367     {
00368     T_Healpix_Base<I> rbase (order,RING), nbase (order,NEST);
00369     rangeset<I> pixset;
00370     int niter=max(1,min(1000,100000>>order));
00371     for (int m=0; m<niter; ++m)
00372       {
00373       vector<pointing> corner(3);
00374       random_dir(corner[0]); random_dir(corner[1]); random_dir(corner[2]);
00375       rbase.query_polygon(corner,pixset);
00376       I nval = pixset.nval();
00377       nbase.query_polygon(corner,pixset);
00378       if (nval!=pixset.nval())
00379         cout << "  PROBLEM: number of pixels different: "
00380              << nval << " vs. " << pixset.nval() << endl;
00381       rbase.query_polygon_inclusive(corner,pixset,4);
00382       I nv1=pixset.nval();
00383       nbase.query_polygon_inclusive(corner,pixset,4);
00384       I nv2=pixset.nval();
00385       if (nv1<nv2)
00386         cout << "  PROBLEM: inclusive(RING)<inclusive(NEST): "
00387              << nv1 << " vs. " << nv2 << endl;
00388       if (nv2<nval)
00389         cout << "  PROBLEM: inclusive(NEST)<non-inclusive: "
00390              << nv2 << " vs. " << nval << endl;
00391       }
00392     }
00393   }
00394 
00395 void helper_oop (int order)
00396   {
00397   Healpix_Map<double> map (order,RING), map2 (order,NEST), map3 (order,RING);
00398   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m) map[m] = rng.rand_uni()+0.01;
00399   map2.Import(map);
00400   map3.Import(map2);
00401   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00402     if (!approx(map[m],map3[m],1e-12))
00403       cout << "PROBLEM: order = " << order << endl;
00404   }
00405 void helper_udgrade (int order, Healpix_Ordering_Scheme s1,
00406   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme s2)
00407   {
00408   Healpix_Map<double> map (order,s1), map2 (order+2,s2), map3 (order, s1);
00409   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m) map[m] = rng.rand_uni()+0.01;
00410   map2.Import(map);
00411   map3.Import(map2);
00412   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00413     if (!approx(map[m],map3[m],1e-12))
00414       cout << "PROBLEM: order = " << order << endl;
00415   }
00416 void helper_udgrade2 (int nside)
00417   {
00418   Healpix_Map<double> map (nside,RING,SET_NSIDE), map2 (nside*3,RING,SET_NSIDE),
00419     map3 (nside, RING,SET_NSIDE);
00420   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m) map[m] = rng.rand_uni()+0.01;
00421   map2.Import(map);
00422   map3.Import(map2);
00423   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00424     if (!approx(map[m],map3[m],1e-12))
00425       cout << "PROBLEM: nside = " << nside << endl;
00426   }
00427 
00428 void check_import()
00429   {
00430   cout << "testing out-of-place swapping" << endl;
00431   for (int order=0; order<=7; ++order)
00432     helper_oop(order);
00433   cout << "testing downgrade(upgrade(map)) == map" << endl;
00434   for (int order=0; order<=7; ++order)
00435     {
00436     helper_udgrade(order,RING,RING);
00437     helper_udgrade(order,RING,NEST);
00438     helper_udgrade(order,NEST,NEST);
00439     helper_udgrade(order,NEST,RING);
00440     }
00441   for (int nside=3; nside<500; nside+=nside/2+1)
00442     helper_udgrade2(nside);
00443   }
00444 
00445 void check_average()
00446   {
00447   cout << "testing whether average(map) == average(downgraded map)" << endl;
00448   for (int order=1; order<=10; ++order)
00449     {
00450     Healpix_Map<double> map (order,RING), map2(1,RING);
00451     for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00452       map[m] = rng.rand_uni()+0.01;
00453     map2.Import(map);
00454     double avg=map.average(), avg2=map2.average();
00455     if (!approx(avg,avg2,1e-10))
00456       cout << "PROBLEM: order = " << order << " " << avg/avg2-1 << endl;
00457     }
00458   for (int nside=3; nside<1000; nside += nside/2+1)
00459     {
00460     Healpix_Map<double> map (nside,RING,SET_NSIDE), map2(1,RING,SET_NSIDE);
00461     for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00462       map[m] = rng.rand_uni()+0.01;
00463     map2.Import(map);
00464     double avg=map.average(), avg2=map2.average();
00465     if (!approx(avg,avg2,1e-10))
00466       cout << "PROBLEM: nside = " << nside << " " << avg/avg2-1 << endl;
00467     }
00468   }
00469 
00470 void random_alm (Alm<xcomplex<double> >&almT, Alm<xcomplex<double> >&almG,
00471   Alm<xcomplex<double> >&almC, int lmax, int mmax)
00472   {
00473   almT.Set(lmax,mmax); almG.Set(lmax,mmax); almC.Set(lmax,mmax);
00474 
00475   for (int l=0; l<=lmax; ++l)
00476     {
00477     almT(l,0).re=rng.rand_gauss(); almT(l,0).im=0.;
00478     almG(l,0).re=rng.rand_gauss(); almG(l,0).im=0.;
00479     almC(l,0).re=rng.rand_gauss(); almC(l,0).im=0.;
00480     }
00481 
00482   for (int m=1; m<=mmax; ++m)
00483     for (int l=m; l<=lmax; ++l)
00484       {
00485       almT(l,m).re=rng.rand_gauss(); almT(l,m).im=rng.rand_gauss();
00486       almG(l,m).re=rng.rand_gauss(); almG(l,m).im=rng.rand_gauss();
00487       almC(l,m).re=rng.rand_gauss(); almC(l,m).im=rng.rand_gauss();
00488       }
00489   almG(0,0)=almC(0,0)=almG(1,0)=almC(1,0)=almG(1,1)=almC(1,1)=0;
00490   }
00491 
00492 void random_alm (Alm<xcomplex<double> >&alm, int lmax, int mmax)
00493   {
00494   alm.Set(lmax,mmax);
00495 
00496   for (int l=0; l<=lmax; ++l)
00497     { alm(l,0).re=rng.rand_gauss(); alm(l,0).im=0.; }
00498 
00499   for (int m=1; m<=mmax; ++m)
00500     for (int l=m; l<=lmax; ++l)
00501       { alm(l,m).re=rng.rand_gauss(); alm(l,m).im=rng.rand_gauss(); }
00502   }
00503 
00504 void check_alm (const Alm<xcomplex<double> >&oalm,
00505   const Alm<xcomplex<double> >&alm, double epsilon)
00506   {
00507   for (int m=0; m<=alm.Mmax(); ++m)
00508     for (int l=m; l<=alm.Lmax(); ++l)
00509       {
00510       if (!abs_approx(oalm(l,m).re,alm(l,m).re,epsilon))
00511         cout << "Problemr " << l << " " << m << endl;
00512       if (!abs_approx(oalm(l,m).im,alm(l,m).im,epsilon))
00513         cout << "Problemi " << l << " " << m <<  endl;
00514       }
00515   }
00516 
00517 void check_alm2map2alm (int lmax, int mmax, int nside)
00518   {
00519   cout << "testing whether a_lm->map->a_lm returns original a_lm" << endl;
00520   cout << "lmax=" << lmax <<", mmax=" << mmax << ", nside=" << nside << endl;
00521   const double epsilon = 1e-8;
00522   Alm<xcomplex<double> > oalmT(lmax,mmax),almT(lmax,mmax),
00523     oalmG(lmax,mmax),almG(lmax,mmax),oalmC(lmax,mmax),almC(lmax,mmax);
00524   Healpix_Map<double> mapT(nside,RING,SET_NSIDE), mapQ(nside,RING,SET_NSIDE),
00525     mapU(nside,RING,SET_NSIDE);
00526 
00527   random_alm(oalmT,oalmG,oalmC,lmax,mmax);
00528   alm2map(oalmT,mapT);
00529   map2alm_iter2(mapT,almT,1e-12,1e-12);
00530   check_alm (oalmT, almT, epsilon);
00531 
00532   alm2map_spin(oalmG,oalmC,mapQ,mapU,1);
00533   map2alm_spin_iter2(mapQ,mapU,almG,almC,1,1e-12,1e-12);
00534   check_alm (oalmG, almG, epsilon);
00535   check_alm (oalmC, almC, epsilon);
00536 
00537   alm2map_pol(oalmT,oalmG,oalmC,mapT,mapQ,mapU);
00538   map2alm_pol_iter2(mapT,mapQ,mapU,almT,almG,almC,1e-12,1e-12);
00539   check_alm (oalmT, almT, epsilon);
00540   check_alm (oalmG, almG, epsilon);
00541   check_alm (oalmC, almC, epsilon);
00542   }
00543 
00544 void check_smooth_alm ()
00545   {
00546   cout << "testing whether unsmooth(smooth(a_lm)) returns a_lm" << endl;
00547   const double epsilon = 1e-14;
00548   const double fwhm = 100.*arcmin2rad;
00549   const int lmax=300, mmax=300;
00550   Alm<xcomplex<double> > oalmT(lmax,mmax),almT(lmax,mmax),
00551     oalmG(lmax,mmax),almG(lmax,mmax),oalmC(lmax,mmax),almC(lmax,mmax);
00552 
00553   random_alm(oalmT,oalmG,oalmC,lmax,mmax);
00554 
00555   almT=oalmT; almG=oalmG; almC=oalmC;
00556   smoothWithGauss (almT, fwhm);
00557   smoothWithGauss (almT, -fwhm);
00558   check_alm (oalmT, almT, epsilon);
00559   almT=oalmT;
00560   smoothWithGauss (almT, almG, almC, fwhm);
00561   smoothWithGauss (almT, almG, almC, -fwhm);
00562   check_alm (oalmT, almT, epsilon);
00563   check_alm (oalmG, almG, epsilon);
00564   check_alm (oalmC, almC, epsilon);
00565   }
00566 
00567 void check_rot_alm ()
00568   {
00569   cout << "testing whether rot^-1(rot(a_lm)) returns a_lm" << endl;
00570   const double epsilon = 2e-13;
00571   const int lmax=300;
00572   Alm<xcomplex<double> > oalm(lmax,lmax),alm(lmax,lmax);
00573 
00574   random_alm(oalm,lmax,lmax);
00575 
00576   alm=oalm;
00577   rotate_alm (alm,3,4,5);
00578   rotate_alm (alm,-5,-4,-3);
00579   check_alm (oalm, alm, epsilon);
00580   }
00581 
00582 void check_isqrt()
00583   {
00584   cout << "testing whether isqrt() works reliably" << endl;
00585   uint64 val=uint64(0xF234)<<16, valsq=val*val;
00586   if (isqrt(valsq)!=val) cout << "PROBLEM1" << endl;
00587   if (isqrt(valsq-1)!=val-1) cout << "PROBLEM2" << endl;
00588   }
00589 
00590 void check_pix2ang_acc()
00591   {
00592   cout << "testing accuracy of pix2ang at the poles" << endl;
00593   for (int m=0; m<=29;++m)
00594     {
00595     Healpix_Base2 base(m,RING);
00596     if (base.pix2ang(1).theta==0.)
00597       cout << "PROBLEM: order " << m << endl;
00598     }
00599   }
00600 
00601 const int nsteps=1000000;
00602 
00603 template<typename I>void perf_neighbors(const string &name,
00604   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme)
00605   {
00606   tsize cnt=0;
00607   wallTimers.start(name);
00608   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00609   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00610     {
00611     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,scheme);
00612     I dpix=max(base.Npix()/nsteps,I(1));
00613     fix_arr<I,8> nres;
00614     for (I pix=0; pix<base.Npix(); pix+=dpix)
00615       {
00616       base.neighbors(pix,nres);
00617       ++cnt;
00618       }
00619     }
00620   wallTimers.stop(name);
00621   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-6 << "MOps/s" << endl;
00622   }
00623 template<typename I>void perf_pix2ang(const string &name,
00624   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00625   {
00626   tsize cnt=0;
00627   wallTimers.start(name);
00628   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00629   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00630     {
00631     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,scheme);
00632     I dpix=max(base.Npix()/nsteps,I(1));
00633     for (I pix=0; pix<base.Npix(); pix+=dpix)
00634       {
00635       pointing p(base.pix2ang(pix));
00636       dummy+=p.theta+p.phi;
00637       ++cnt;
00638       }
00639     }
00640   wallTimers.stop(name);
00641   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-6 << "MOps/s" << endl;
00642   }

00644   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00645   {
00646   tsize cnt=0;
00647   wallTimers.start(name);
00648   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00649   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00650     {
00651     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,scheme);
00652     I dpix=max(base.Npix()/nsteps,I(1));
00653     for (I pix=0; pix<base.Npix(); pix+=dpix)
00654       {
00655       vec3 v(base.pix2vec(pix));
00656       dummy+=v.x+v.y+v.z;
00657       ++cnt;
00658       }
00659     }
00660   wallTimers.stop(name);
00661   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-6 << "MOps/s" << endl;
00662   }
00663 template<typename I>void perf_pix2zphi(const string &name,
00664   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00665   {
00666   tsize cnt=0;
00667   wallTimers.start(name);
00668   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00669   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00670     {
00671     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,scheme);
00672     I dpix=max(base.Npix()/nsteps,I(1));
00673     double z,phi;
00674     for (I pix=0; pix<base.Npix(); pix+=dpix)
00675       {
00676       base.pix2zphi(pix,z,phi);
00677       dummy+=z+phi;
00678       ++cnt;
00679       }
00680     }
00681   wallTimers.stop(name);
00682   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-6 << "MOps/s" << endl;
00683   }
00684 template<typename I>void perf_zphi2pix(const string &name,
00685   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00686   {
00687   tsize cnt=0;
00688   wallTimers.start(name);
00689   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00690   double dz=2./sqrt(nsteps);
00691   double dph=twopi/sqrt(nsteps);
00692   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00693     {
00694     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,scheme);
00695     for (double z=-1; z<1; z+=dz)
00696       for (double phi=0; phi<twopi; phi+=dph)
00697         {
00698         dummy+=base.zphi2pix(z,phi);
00699         ++cnt;
00700         }
00701     }
00702   wallTimers.stop(name);
00703   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-6 << "MOps/s" << endl;
00704   }
00705 template<typename I>void perf_ang2pix(const string &name,
00706   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00707   {
00708   tsize cnt=0;
00709   wallTimers.start(name);
00710   int omax=T_Healpix_Base<I>::order_max;
00711   double dth=pi/sqrt(nsteps);
00712   double dph=twopi/sqrt(nsteps);
00713   for (int order=0; order<=omax; ++order)
00714     {
00715     T_Healpix_Base<I> base (order,scheme);
00716     for (double theta=0; theta<pi; theta+=dth)
00717       for (double phi=0; phi<twopi; phi+=dph)
00718         {
00719         dummy+=base.ang2pix(pointing(theta+1e-15*phi,phi));
00720         ++cnt;
00721         }
00722     }
00723   wallTimers.stop(name);
00724   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-6 << "MOps/s" << endl;
00725   }

00798 template<typename I>void perf_query_disc(const string &name,
00799   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00800   {
00801   tsize cnt=0;
00802   T_Healpix_Base<I> base(1024,scheme,SET_NSIDE);
00803   wallTimers.start(name);
00804   for (int m=0; m<1000; ++m)
00805     {
00806     rangeset<I> pix;
00807     base.query_disc(vec3(1,0,0),halfpi/9,pix);
00808     dummy+=pix.size();
00809     ++cnt;
00810     }
00811   wallTimers.stop(name);
00812   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-3 << "kOps/s" << endl;
00813   }
00814 template<typename I>void perf_query_triangle(const string &name,
00815   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00816   {
00817   tsize cnt=0;
00818   T_Healpix_Base<I> base(1024,scheme,SET_NSIDE);
00819   vector<pointing> corner;
00820   corner.push_back(vec3(1,0.01,0.01));
00821   corner.push_back(vec3(0.01,1,0.01));
00822   corner.push_back(vec3(0.01,0.01,1));
00823   wallTimers.start(name);
00824   for (int m=0; m<1000; ++m)
00825     {
00826     rangeset<I> pix;
00827     base.query_polygon(corner,pix);
00828     dummy+=pix.size();
00829     ++cnt;
00830     }
00831   wallTimers.stop(name);
00832   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-3 << "kOps/s" << endl;
00833   }
00834 template<typename I>void perf_query_polygon(const string &name,
00835   Healpix_Ordering_Scheme scheme, double &dummy)
00836   {
00837   tsize cnt=0;
00838   T_Healpix_Base<I> base(1024,scheme,SET_NSIDE);
00839   vector<pointing> corner;
00840   corner.push_back(vec3(1,0.01,0.01));
00841   corner.push_back(vec3(1,1,-0.3));
00842   corner.push_back(vec3(0.01,1,0.01));
00843   corner.push_back(vec3(0.01,0.01,1));
00844   wallTimers.start(name);
00845   for (int m=0; m<1000; ++m)
00846     {
00847     rangeset<I> pix;
00848     base.query_polygon(corner,pix);
00849     dummy+=pix.size();
00850     ++cnt;
00851     }
00852   wallTimers.stop(name);
00853   cout << name << ": " << cnt/wallTimers.acc(name)*1e-3 << "kOps/s" << endl;
00854   }
00855 
00856 void perftest()
00857   {
00858   double dummy=0;
00859   cout << "Measuring performance of Healpix_Base methods." << endl;
00860   perf_pix2zphi<int>   ("pix2zphi (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00861   perf_pix2zphi<int>   ("pix2zphi (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00862   perf_pix2zphi<int64> ("pix2zphi (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00863   perf_pix2zphi<int64> ("pix2zphi (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00864   perf_zphi2pix<int>   ("zphi2pix (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00865   perf_zphi2pix<int>   ("zphi2pix (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00866   perf_zphi2pix<int64> ("zphi2pix (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00867   perf_zphi2pix<int64> ("zphi2pix (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00868   perf_pix2ang<int>    ("pix2ang  (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00869   perf_pix2ang<int>    ("pix2ang  (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00870   perf_pix2ang<int64>  ("pix2ang  (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00871   perf_pix2ang<int64>  ("pix2ang  (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00872   perf_ang2pix<int>    ("ang2pix  (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00873   perf_ang2pix<int>    ("ang2pix  (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00874   perf_ang2pix<int64>  ("ang2pix  (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00875   perf_ang2pix<int64>  ("ang2pix  (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00876   perf_pix2vec<int>    ("pix2vec  (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00877   perf_pix2vec<int>    ("pix2vec  (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00878   perf_pix2vec<int64>  ("pix2vec  (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00879   perf_pix2vec<int64>  ("pix2vec  (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00880   perf_neighbors<int>  ("neighbors(NEST):int  ",NEST);
00881   perf_neighbors<int>  ("neighbors(RING):int  ",RING);
00882   perf_neighbors<int64>("neighbors(NEST):int64",NEST);
00883   perf_neighbors<int64>("neighbors(RING):int64",RING);
00884   perf_ring2nest<int>  ("ring2nest      :int  ",dummy);
00885   perf_ring2nest<int64>("ring2nest      :int64",dummy);
00886   perf_nest2ring<int>  ("nest2ring      :int  ",dummy);
00887   perf_nest2ring<int64>("nest2ring      :int64",dummy);
00888   perf_peano2nest<int>  ("peano2nest     :int  ",dummy);
00889   perf_peano2nest<int64>("peano2nest     :int64",dummy);
00890   perf_nest2peano<int>  ("nest2peano     :int  ",dummy);
00891   perf_nest2peano<int64>("nest2peano     :int64",dummy);
00892   perf_query_disc<int>      ("query_disc    (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00893   perf_query_disc<int>      ("query_disc    (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00894   perf_query_disc<int64>    ("query_disc    (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00895   perf_query_disc<int64>    ("query_disc    (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00896   perf_query_triangle<int>  ("query_triangle(RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00897   perf_query_triangle<int>  ("query_triangle(NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00898   perf_query_triangle<int64>("query_triangle(RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00899   perf_query_triangle<int64>("query_triangle(NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00900   perf_query_polygon<int>   ("query_polygon (RING):int  ",RING,dummy);
00901   perf_query_polygon<int>   ("query_polygon (NEST):int  ",NEST,dummy);
00902   perf_query_polygon<int64> ("query_polygon (RING):int64",RING,dummy);
00903   perf_query_polygon<int64> ("query_polygon (NEST):int64",NEST,dummy);
00904 
00905   if (dummy<0) cout << dummy << endl;
00906   }
00907 } // unnamed namespace
00908 
00909 int main(int argc, const char **argv)
00910   {
00911   module_startup ("hpxtest",argc,argv,1,"");
00912   perftest();
00913   check_isqrt();
00914   check_pix2ang_acc();
00915   check_smooth_alm();
00916   check_rot_alm();
00917   check_alm2map2alm(620,620,256);
00918   check_alm2map2alm(620,2,256);
00919   check_average();
00920   check_import();
00921   check_ringnestring<int>();
00922   check_ringnestring<int64>();
00923   check_nestpeanonest<int>();
00924   check_nestpeanonest<int64>();
00925   check_pixzphipix<int>();
00926   check_pixzphipix<int64>();
00927   check_zphipixzphi<int>();
00928   check_zphipixzphi<int64>();
00929   check_pixangpix<int>();
00930   check_pixangpix<int64>();
00931   check_neighbors<int>();
00932   check_neighbors<int64>();
00933   check_swap_scheme();
00934   check_query_disc_strict(RING);
00935   check_query_disc_strict(NEST);
00936   check_query_disc<int>();
00937   check_query_disc<int64>();
00938   check_query_polygon<int>();
00939   check_query_polygon<int64>();
00940   }
